This vignettes describes a recommended workflow how functions of `spAddins` 
package should be used.  

1. Install package
------------------
Package `spAddins` can be installed from CRAN:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("spAddins")
```
You can also install a development version the package from GitHub:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("GegznaV/spAddins")
```

2. Set keyboard shortcuts
-----------------------------

Set keyboard shortcuts in RStudio for desired addins as described in 
[this example](https://rstudio.github.io/rstudioaddins/#keyboard-shorcuts).
 
3. Use keyboard shortcut
--------------------------

Use your keyboard shortcut to call a desired addin function.
